soul_strike.name: Lucrecia's Lament
soul_strike.description: Deal six ranged physical or magic fire and non-elemental attacks to all targets, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Hellhound EX mode. Hellhound EX mode temporarily raises the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount, and reduces delay of the user's next action after using a fire attack. Type of damage dealt and stat raised depends on the user's stats.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal six ranged physical or magic fire and non-elemental attacks to all targets, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Hellhound EX mode. Hellhound EX mode temporarily raises the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount, and reduces delay of the user's next action after using a fire attack. Type of damage dealt and stat raised depends on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Climirage
soul_strike.description: Deal fifteen physical wind attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and enter True Form EX Mode. True Form EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, and causes their wind abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Air Hazard, dealing four or eight physical wind and non-elemental attacks that can break the damage cap.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal fifteen physical wind attacks to one enemy, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, and enter True Form EX Mode. True Form EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, and causes their wind abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Air Hazard, dealing four or eight physical wind and non-elemental attacks that can break the damage cap.

soul_strike.name: Innocent Cure
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their physical attacks for three turns, and grant them Last Stand.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their physical attacks for three turns, and grant them Last Stand.

soul_strike.name: Empty Fist
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical attacks to one enemy, temporarily raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, increase the damage of the user's critical hits, and cause the user's critical hits to trigger the follow-up ability Follow-Up Flurry, dealing four physical attacks to one enemy.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical attacks to one enemy, temporarily raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, increase the damage of the user's critical hits, and cause the user's critical hits to trigger the follow-up ability Follow-Up Flurry, dealing four physical attacks to one enemy.

soul_strike.name: Neo Grand Cross
soul_strike.description: Deal six magic dark and non-elemental attacks to all targets, temporarily absorb enemy black magic and white magic abilities cast on the user to restore one ability use, and raise the Magic and Mind of all allies a moderate amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal six magic dark and non-elemental attacks to all targets, temporarily absorb enemy black magic and white magic abilities cast on the user to restore one ability use, and raise the Magic and Mind of all allies a moderate amount.

soul_strike.name: Ragnarok Buster
soul_strike.description: Deal seven ranged physical ice and non-elemental attacks to all enemies, temporarily lower their ice resistance level by 2, reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn, raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and reduce delay of the user's actions for one turn when using an ice attack.

Number of attacks depends on the Mirror Image stacks on the user.

soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic dark and holy attacks to one target, Doom the user (Countdown 30), remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's dark and holy abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Seraph-Wing Buffet. soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic dark and holy attacks to one target, Doom the user (Countdown 30), remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's dark and holy abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Seraph-Wing Buffet. Deals more damage if the user has Doom.

soul_strike.name: Jackpot Triad
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic fire and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Attack Hand EX Mode. Attack Hand EX Mode enables follow-up attacks when an ability is used, reduces delay of the user's actions, and raises the user's Magic a moderate amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic fire and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of fire, and enter Attack Hand EX Mode. Attack Hand EX Mode enables follow-up attacks when an ability is used, reduces delay of the user's actions, and raises the user's Magic a moderate amount.

soul_strike.name: Jecht Slash
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical fire and non-elemental attacks to one target, remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, infuse the user with the power of fire, and cause the user's fire abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Beast Rush, dealing six physical fire and non-elemental attacks to one target.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical fire and non-elemental attacks to one target, remove delay from the user's actions for one turn, temporarily raise the user's Attack a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, infuse the user with the power of fire, and cause the user's fire abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Beast Rush, dealing six physical fire and non-elemental attacks to one target.

soul_strike.name: Storm
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, reduces delay of the user's actions, and causes every second wind ability used by the user to trigger the follow-up attack Slice that deals five or ten magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one enemy.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of wind, reduces delay of the user's actions, and causes every second wind ability used by the user to trigger the follow-up attack Slice that deals five or ten magic wind and non-elemental attacks to one enemy.

soul_strike.name: Crystal Power
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic fire, ice, and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, temporarily cause the user's witch abilities to reduce delay of their actions for one turn, and cause attacks of the target's Vulnerable or Slight Weakness elements to trigger the follow-up ability Tceles Nottub B, dealing four magic fire, ice, lightning, and non-elemental attacks to one target.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic fire, ice, and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, temporarily cause the user's witch abilities to reduce delay of their actions for one turn, and cause attacks of the target's Vulnerable or Slight Weakness elements to trigger the follow-up ability Tceles Nottub B, dealing four magic fire, ice, lightning, and non-elemental attacks to one target.

soul_strike.name: Live to Serve
soul_strike.description: Temporarily raise the user's Defense, Resistance, and Mind a large amount, automatically heal damage the user takes (up to 6000 HP in total), and if the user is in the front row temporarily gain a high chance to cover physical and magic attacks targeting allies in the rear row, reducing damage taken a large amount. Effective against most attacks.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Temporarily raise the user's Defense, Resistance, and Mind a large amount, automatically heal damage the user takes (up to 6000 HP in total), and if the user is in the front row temporarily gain a high chance to cover physical and magic attacks targeting allies in the rear row, reducing damage taken a large amount. Effective against most attacks.

soul_strike.name: Tree of Sephira
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, raise the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and cause the user's dark abilities to trigger Sephira. Attack type, stats increased, and Sephira effects depend on the user's stats.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical or magic dark and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, raise the user's Attack or Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and cause the user's dark abilities to trigger Sephira. Attack type, stats increased, and Sephira effects depend on the user's stats.

soul_strike.name: Tycoon Princess
soul_strike.description: Restore a large amount of HP to all allies, grant them Last Stand, and grant them a barrier that negates attack damage up to 30% of their max HP.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Restore a large amount of HP to all allies, grant them Last Stand, and grant them a barrier that negates attack damage up to 30% of their max HP.

soul_strike.name: Call of the Stars
soul_strike.description: Grant Haste to all allies, and temporarily raise their Attack and Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Grant Haste to all allies, and temporarily raise their Attack and Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount.

soul_strike.name: Burning Steel
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical fire and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their fire resistance level by 2, and cause fire abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Flame Hunt, dealing physical fire and non-elemental damage to one enemy, with a moderate chance to temporarily lower its fire resistance level by 1.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical fire and non-elemental attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their fire resistance level by 2, and cause fire abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Flame Hunt, dealing physical fire and non-elemental damage to one enemy, with a moderate chance to temporarily lower its fire resistance level by 1.

soul_strike.name: Empyrean's Edict
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of lightning, raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's black magic abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Lightning Sigil, dealing two to six magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the triggering ability's rank.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of lightning, raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's black magic abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Lightning Sigil, dealing two to six magic lightning and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the triggering ability's rank.

soul_strike.name: Divine Fist
soul_strike.description: Deal ten summon magic holy and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of holy light, raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and trigger Chain of Destruction after a delay, dealing five summon magic holy and non-elemental attacks to one target.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten summon magic holy and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of holy light, raise the user's Magic a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, and trigger Chain of Destruction after a delay, dealing five summon magic holy and non-elemental attacks to one target.

soul_strike.name: Crashing Darkness
soul_strike.description: Deal seven magic dark and lightning attacks to all enemies, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, raise the Magic of all allies a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's dark abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Lightning, dealing magic dark, lightning, and non-elemental damage to all targets.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal seven magic dark and lightning attacks to all enemies, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, raise the Magic of all allies a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount, and cause the user's dark abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Lightning, dealing magic dark, lightning, and non-elemental damage to all targets.

soul_strike.name: Awakening
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical earth and dark attacks to one target, grant the user a shield enabling them to avoid two physical or magic attacks, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, and enter Assault Mode. Assault Mode reduces delay of the user's actions until taking damage, and causes the user's spellblade abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Rush Blade. Shield is effective against most physical or magic attacks.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical earth and dark attacks to one target, grant the user a shield enabling them to avoid two physical or magic attacks, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, and enter Assault Mode. Assault Mode reduces delay of the user's actions until taking damage, and causes the user's spellblade abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Rush Blade. Shield is effective against most physical or magic attacks.

soul_strike.name: Templar's Fury
soul_strike.description: Deal ten ranged physical earth and holy attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their earth resistance level by 2, and lower their Magic, Defense, and Resistance a large amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten ranged physical earth and holy attacks to random enemies, temporarily lower their earth resistance level by 2, and lower their Magic, Defense, and Resistance a large amount.

soul_strike.name: Royal Brotherhood
soul_strike.description: Deal ten ranged physical poison, fire, and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily grant moderate Ability Boost to the user's machinist abilities, and enter Machinery EX Mode. Machinery EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, reduces delay of the user's machinist abilities, and causes poison, fire, and lightning machinist abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Enfeeble.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten ranged physical poison, fire, and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily grant moderate Ability Boost to the user's machinist abilities, and enter Machinery EX Mode. Machinery EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Attack a moderate amount, reduces delay of the user's machinist abilities, and causes poison, fire, and lightning machinist abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Enfeeble.

soul_strike.name: Grand Lethal
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical wind and non-elemental attacks to random targets, temporarily lower their wind resistance level by 2, and enter Master Thief EX Mode. Master Thief EX Mode causes the user's thief abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Steel Storm, dealing physical wind and non-elemental damage to one target, with a moderate chance to temporarily lower its wind resistance level by 1.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical wind and non-elemental attacks to random targets, temporarily lower their wind resistance level by 2, and enter Master Thief EX Mode. Master Thief EX Mode causes the user's thief abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Steel Storm, dealing physical wind and non-elemental damage to one target, with a moderate chance to temporarily lower its wind resistance level by 1.

soul_strike.name: Magika Album
soul_strike.description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their actions for two turns, and grant them Regenga, restoring 2,000 HP per tick.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Instantly restore a large amount of HP to all allies, reduce delay of their actions for two turns, and grant them Regenga, restoring 2,000 HP per tick.

soul_strike.name: Lord of the Seas
soul_strike.description: Deal ten summon magic water and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, and raise the Magic of all allies a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten summon magic water and non-elemental attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of water, and raise the Magic of all allies a moderate amount and Resistance a small amount.

soul_strike.name: Shock Imperial
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical earth and holy attacks to one target, temporarily raise the Attack of all allies a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, temporarily increase the damage of the user's knight abilities a moderate amount, and cause the user's knight abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Way of the Blade, dealing four physical earth, holy, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical earth and holy attacks to one target, temporarily raise the Attack of all allies a moderate amount and Defense a small amount, temporarily increase the damage of the user's knight abilities a moderate amount, and cause the user's knight abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Way of the Blade, dealing four physical earth, holy, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy.

soul_strike.name: Brotherhood of the Dawn
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical earth and wind attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, raise the user's Defense a large amount, and cause the user's knight abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Sandwind Blade, dealing two to six earth, wind, and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the triggering ability's rank.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical earth and wind attacks to one target, temporarily infuse the user with the power of earth, raise the user's Defense a large amount, and cause the user's knight abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Sandwind Blade, dealing two to six earth, wind, and non-elemental attacks to one target. Number of attacks depends on the triggering ability's rank.

soul_strike.name: Whetted Blade
soul_strike.description: Deal ten physical holy, ice, wind, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily absorb enemy black magic and white magic abilities cast on the user to restore one ability use, temporarily increase the damage of the user's spellblade abilities a moderate amount, and cause the user's spellblade abilities to double cast.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten physical holy, ice, wind, and non-elemental attacks to one enemy, temporarily absorb enemy black magic and white magic abilities cast on the user to restore one ability use, temporarily increase the damage of the user's spellblade abilities a moderate amount, and cause the user's spellblade abilities to double cast.

soul_strike.name: Magitek Rampage
soul_strike.description: Deal ten magic dark and poison attacks to random targets, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, and enter Forged Magitek EX Mode. Forged Magitek EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Magic a moderate amount, and causes the user's dark abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Magitek Blast. Magitek Blast deals four to eight magic dark, poison, and non-elemental attacks. Number of attacks and damage increases the more times Magitek Blast triggers.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten magic dark and poison attacks to random targets, temporarily infuse the user with the power of the dark, and enter Forged Magitek EX Mode. Forged Magitek EX Mode temporarily raises the user's Magic a moderate amount, and causes the user's dark abilities to trigger the follow-up ability Magitek Blast. Magitek Blast deals four to eight magic dark, poison, and non-elemental attacks. Number of attacks and damage increases the more times Magitek Blast triggers.

soul_strike.name: Culinary Curiosity
soul_strike.description: Temporarily raise the Attack of all allies a large amount, and grant them Protect, Shell, and Haste.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Temporarily raise the Attack of all allies a large amount, and grant them Protect, Shell, and Haste.

soul_strike.name: Twin Summoning
soul_strike.description: Deal ten summon magic fire and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily increase the user's summon magic damage a moderate amount, and periodically use Firebolt Barrage to deal four summon magic fire and lightning attacks to all targets.
soul_strike.extensive_description: Deal ten summon magic fire and lightning attacks to one target, temporarily increase the user's summon magic damage a moderate amount, and periodically use Firebolt Barrage to deal four summon magic fire and lightning attacks to all targets.
